mapper.select: SELECT os.order_set_id AS orderSetId, os.order_code AS orderCode, os.order_address AS orderAddress, os.order_phone_number AS orderPhoneNumber, COUNT(DISTINCT (i.item_id)) AS distinctItemCount FROM order_detail AS od JOIN order_set AS os ON od.order_set_id = os.order_set_id JOIN cargo c ON od.cargo_id = c.cargo_id JOIN item AS i ON i.item_id = c.item_id WHERE os.consumer_id = #{consumer_id} GROUP BY os.order_set_id
